salads.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
salads.recipe: 1 cup cooked quinoa, 1 cucumber diced, 1 cup cherry tomatoes halved, 1/2 red onion sliced, 1/2 cup kalamata olives, 1/2 cup feta cheese (omit for vegan), 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste. Mix all ingredients and serve chilled.

salads.name: Kale and Avocado Salad
salads.recipe: 4 cups chopped kale, 1 ripe avocado, 1/4 cup pumpkin seeds, 1/4 cup dried cranberries, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp apple cider vinegar, 1 tsp honey (or maple syrup for vegan), salt to taste. Massage kale with avocado until soft, then add remaining ingredients.

salads.name: High-Protein Chicken Salad
salads.recipe: 2 cups mixed greens, 150g grilled chicken breast, 1 hard-boiled egg, 1/4 avocado, 1/4 cup chickpeas, 1 tbsp sunflower seeds, 2 tbsp Greek yogurt dressing (Greek yogurt + lemon juice + garlic powder). Combine all ingredients and toss with dressing.

salads.name: Asian Edamame Salad
salads.recipe: 2 cups mixed greens, 1 cup shelled edamame, 1/2 red bell pepper sliced, 1/4 cup shredded carrots, 1 tbsp sesame seeds. Dressing: 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1 tbsp rice vinegar, 1 tsp soy sauce, 1/2 tsp ginger grated. Whisk dressing and toss with salad.

salads.name: Keto Cobb Salad
salads.recipe: 2 cups romaine lettuce, 2 boiled eggs, 1/2 avocado, 4 strips cooked bacon, 50g blue cheese, 100g grilled chicken, 2 tbsp ranch dressing. Layer ingredients and serve with dressing.

salads.name: Detox Green Salad
salads.recipe: 2 cups baby spinach, 1/2 green apple sliced, 1/4 cucumber sliced, 1/4 avocado, 2 tbsp walnuts, 1 tbsp chia seeds. Dressing: 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 lemon juiced, 1 tsp honey. Combine all ingredients and toss gently.

salads.name: Bodybuilder's Tuna Salad
salads.recipe: 150g canned tuna in water (drained), 2 cups mixed greens, 1/2 cup cooked quinoa, 5 cherry tomatoes halved, 1/4 red onion sliced, 10 black olives, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar. Mix all ingredients together.

salads.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
salads.recipe: 1 cup cooked quinoa or brown rice, 1/2 cup chickpeas, 1/2 sweet potato roasted, 1/4 avocado, 1 cup kale, 2 tbsp tahini dressing (tahini + lemon juice + water + garlic). Arrange ingredients in bowl and drizzle with dressing.

salads.name: Greek Salad
salads.recipe: 2 cups romaine lettuce, 1 cucumber diced, 1 cup cherry tomatoes halved, 1/2 red onion sliced, 1/2 cup kalamata olives, 100g feta cheese (omit for vegan), 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp red wine vinegar, 1 tsp oregano. Combine all ingredients and toss.

salads.name: Warm Roasted Vegetable Salad
salads.recipe: 1 cup mixed roasted vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, eggplant), 2 cups baby spinach, 1/4 cup goat cheese (optional), 2 tbsp pine nuts, 1 tbsp balsamic glaze. Arrange warm vegetables over spinach and top with remaining ingredients.
